duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installations and configurations of grid infrastructure, databases, clients, etc.
Design and maintain access and security administration.
Design, implement, and maintain backup and recovery strategies on Database Management Systems.
Support multiple services and multiple databases of medium complexity with multiple concurrent users, ensuring control, integrity, and accessibility of data.
Design, install, configure, and maintain High Availability (RAC, RAC One Node, Data Guard, etc.) Database solutions.
Perform capacity planning of Oracle server environment and provide recommendations to management to sustain business growth.
Design, implement, maintain Disaster Recovery (DR) methodologies and create documentation.
Gather business requirements and design, implement multiple projects along with the production support.
Create standard operational procedures and templates.
Act as mentor for Database Administrators and Associate Database Administrators.
Perform research and provide plans to remediate complex business problems.
Assist the development teams to improve database design and procedures on PL/SQL best practices, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
